metadata.description: Number of server nodes (? or less). Should be an odd number. If single node ignored?
Instance type of a server node
Number of agent nodes (? or less)
Instance type of an agent node
Number of agent nodes with GPU capabilities (? or less)
Instance type of a gpu agent node
OPTIONAL: Instance type of the task mining node. This will only be used if you enable task mining.

SQL Server user login. If the 'SQLNewOrExisting' parameter is set to `existing` this is the user for the existing SQL server. Otherwise this username will be set on the SQL server created. Please see this link for permissions: https://docs.uipath.com/automation-suite/docs/multi-node-configuring-ms-sql-server#permissions

SQL Server user password. If the 'SQLNewOrExisting' parameter is set to `existing` this is the user password for the existing SQL server. Otherwise this password will be set on the SQL server created.
UiPath Automation Suite User login
UiPath Automation Suite User password
Virtual Machine User login
Virtual Machine User password
Flag which determines whether Action Center should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Test Manager should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Insights should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Data Service should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Automation Hub should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Automation Ops should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Apps should be installed.
Flag which determines whether AI Center should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Task Mining should be installed.
Flag which determines whether Document Understanding should be installed.

runbookScripts.name: InstanceRefresh
runbookScripts.description: Runbook to perform instance refresh on an Automation Suite cluster.

runbookScripts.name: RemoveServers
runbookScripts.description: Runbook to perform server removal from the Automation Suite cluster.

runbookScripts.name: RemoveNodes
runbookScripts.description: Runbook to perform specific node removal from the Automation Suite cluster.

runbookScripts.name: ImportASModules
runbookScripts.description: Runbook to import the modules needed by the Automation Suite runbooks.

runbookScripts.name: CheckServerZoneResilience
runbookScripts.description: Runbook to check the server zone resilience and tries to distribute a node to other Availability Zone if needed.

automationAccountAdditionalVariables.name: removeNodeScriptURL
automationAccountAdditionalVariables.description: URL of the script used to remove a node from Automation Suite Cluster

automationAccountAdditionalVariables.name: removeNodeUtilsURL
automationAccountAdditionalVariables.description: URL of the utils module used to remove a node from Automation Suite Cluster
